colorRamp.name: Quantum Leap
colorRamp.formula:
rgb_t
(
    smootherstep ( 0, 1, interpolate ([ [ 0, 0 ], [ 0.5, 0.75 ], [ 1, 0 ] ], t, 0) ),
    smootherstep ( 0, 1, interpolate ([ [ 0, 0 ], [ 0.5, 0.75 ], [ 1, 0 ] ], t, 50) ),
    smootherstep ( 0, 1, interpolate ([ [ 0, 0 ], [ 0.5, 0.75 ], [ 1, 0 ] ], t, 100) )
)
